summary: My first attempt at giving back to community that made me play Skyrim for the past 6 years! <3
descriptionHtml:
Changelog

v2. Reduced prepass quality to gain some more fps (and playable)

Entropy ENB is a preset that I've created for what suits me the most. The preset is very performance friendly, I use the shittiest of PCs and it didn't break mine, I hope you'll be able to fly with it :P

Installation:
1. Download the latest enb v.319 from here: http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html
2.Extract only [b]d3d9.dll[/b] and [b]enbhost.exe[/b] (from the [b]Wrapper[/b] folder) into main folder (the one which contains TESV.exe)
3. Download and extract Entropy ENB into the main folder, overwrite if asked
4. Play and ENDORSE ;)


Mods used in the screenshots (RECOMMENDED):

Climates Of Tamriel - Weather - Lighting - Audio by [b]jjc71[/b] (to get similar effects as the screenshots)
KS Hairdos - Renewal by [b]Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky[/b]
Enhanced Lights and FX by [b]anamorfus[/b]
Purity by [b]Laast[/b]
Seranaholic by [b]rxkx22[/b]
Volkihar Knight - Vampire Armor by [b]Yamanotaka[/b]
Artifacts - The Breton Paladin by [b]FrankFamily: [/b]
SkySight Skins - Ultra HD 4K and 2K - Male Textures and Real Feet Meshes by [b]fadingsignal[/b]
High Res Face Maps for Men by Geonox by [b]Geonox
[/b]Destro La Vampyre by [b]vvalentine73[/b][b]
[/b]Â 
Don't forget to add some of your screenshots :D
author: vvalentine73
